Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54.server.model

Interface Player

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApolloDecorator, ArtemisDecorator, AthenaDecorator, AthenaSideEffectDecorator, AtlasDecorator, DemeterDecorator, GodDecorator, HephaestusDecorator, MinotaurDecorator, PanDecorator, PrometheusDecorator, StandardPlayer
public interface Player

  • Method Details

    • assignPower

      Player assignPower​(int cardID)
      Called whenever a player needs to be decorated.
      Parameters:
      cardID - the number of the card
      Returns:
      the decorated player

    • setWorkerPos

      void setWorkerPos​(Worker worker, int x, int y) throws InvalidMoveException
      Sets initial position on the board for the selected worker.
      Parameters:
      worker - the selected worker.
      x - the board abscissa.
      y - the board ordinate.
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - if the designed box is occupied.

    • areWorkerSettled

      boolean areWorkerSettled()
      Called to determine if the player's worker are placed on the board.
      Returns:
      true if both workers are placed, false otherwise.

    • nextCurrentWorker

      void nextCurrentWorker​(Worker currentWorker)
      Called only for the initial worker's placement. It sets the next worker to current.
      Parameters:
      currentWorker - previous current worker.

    • getWorker

      Worker getWorker​(java.lang.Boolean male)
      Select the worker which player is going to use depending on the worker's sex.
      Parameters:
      male - the worker's sex.
      Returns:
      the chosen worker.

    • turnInit

      Worker turnInit​(java.lang.Boolean male)
      Method used to initialize current player's turn.
      Parameters:
      male - represent the sex of the worker which the player is going to use.
      Returns:
      the chosen worker with updated tokens.

    • setWorkerBoxesToMove

      java.util.ArrayList<Box> setWorkerBoxesToMove​(Worker worker)
      Method used to set available boxes for the worker to move.
      Parameters:
      worker - current worker in use.
      Returns:
      the vector containing available boxes.

    • setWorkerBoxesToBuild

      java.util.ArrayList<Box> setWorkerBoxesToBuild​(Worker worker)
      Method used to set available boxes for the worker to build.
      Parameters:
      worker - current worker in use.
      Returns:
      the vector containing buildable boxes.

    • move

      void move​(Worker worker, Box dest) throws InvalidMoveException
      Method used to perform a move action.
      Parameters:
      worker - selected worker which the player wants to move.
      dest - selected destination box.
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException - if the move can't be done.

    • build

      void build​(Worker worker, Box dest) throws InvalidBuildingException
      Method used to perform a build action.
      Parameters:
      worker - selected worker which the player wants to move.
      dest - selected box where to build.
      Throws:
      InvalidBuildingException - if the build can't be done.

    • checkWinner

      void checkWinner​(Worker worker)
      Called to check if the player has won.
      Parameters:
      worker - the current worker which the player has moved.

    • chose

      void chose​(boolean choice)
      Method used to perform a binary choice.
      Parameters:
      choice - the player's choice.

    • setGame

      void setGame​(Game game)
      Creates a reference to the current Game, in order to access board's and other players' info.
      Parameters:
      game - the current Game.
